title: The Fake Cancer Conman
description:
A young father of three is beaten to death with a fire extinguisher in a motel room near Heathrow airport. Police wonder if his mysterious lover, a conman who faked cancer to scam his friends and family out of hundreds of thousands of pounds, could have been hiding even darker secrets.

Source materials for this episode cannot be listed here due to character limitations. For a full list of sources, please visit https://redcollarpodcast.com/
author: content@audiochuck.com (audiochuck)
